text: Can you change p tag to a div <@UP79BQ7AP>

Hey everyone - has anyone had the issue that the email logo gets upscaled by HubSpot and gmail app shows it at a much larger size than the actual image dimensions are? Looks fine on all other email programs

Email Templates work differently as compared to Page Templates. If you want to add custom styles to an email you can add to the <head>.
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/email/can-i-add-css-to-the-head-section-of-my-email-templates>
Can you explain that a bit more?

Sorry Dillon, didn't get your original @mention. This might be a good use of the `data-hse-inline-css` attribute. If you were to move that style to a <style> tag in the head you simply change the `<style>` to `<style data-hse-inline-css="true">` then everything within that style tag would automatically be inlined into the elements it's targeting. This is a bit of documentation on it: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/email-template-markup#hs-inline-css-and-data-hse-inline-css>
Oh. Okay, that makes sense. Thanks Shay.
